title: I accidently closed my league of legeds client,,where is my replay ??
body:
i accidently closed my league of legends client,,  and lost my..{{champion:67}}   replay i got sick score  with 41 kills ,,
is there anyway to retreive my replay when i didnt download it,,and closed the client

replies.body: If you go into your Profile in the client, then select Match History, you should see a little button to the right of the match where you played {{champion:67}} . Click on that button and it should start downloading your replay!

hi 

i click to download replay

its error , how can i fix it?

If you're getting some kind of error when you try to download that sick replay, there's a chance that the replay data itself is corrupted. If that's the case, we may not be able to recover it for you. Shoot me a picture of the error you're getting and then I can see exactly what's happening.
